address.full: Via San Lazzaro, 1, Trieste, Friuli-Venezia Giulia 34122, Italy

conversation:
host: Ciao Guillermo Hernan,

spero che tutto sia di vostro gradimento e che possiate godervi il soggiorno.
Sono a vostra disposizione per qualsiasi problema o segnalazione, anche telefonicamente al +39 0409778989

--------------------

Hey Guillermo Hernan,
 
I hope that you have settled in alright and that you are enjoying your stay.
Please let me know if there is anything you need or if I can assist you in any way, also by phone +39 0409778989
host: Great 😊 enjoy your stay

host: Ciao, check-in today! Address: via San Lazzaro 1, Trieste, 1st floor, apt 2 Building access: ring 'Lazzaro' 
Keys are inside the keybox 2 near door A. Use code 2860 and push down the switch. See https://u.nu/CFkTi Enjoy your stay!
guest: Just arrived
guest: If not possible I understand. Anyway I’m already in Trieste, I can go to the apartment now

guest: Hello! Thank you!
I made a mistake because it’s kind of inconvenient to stay there so many days because I would stay at a friend’s place instead.  I was wondering if it’s possible to cancel or reduce the amounts of days to 2 and how would be the procedure.
host: Hello Guillermo the apartment is ready for you at your disposal ☺️
guest: I did reservation a few hours ago. Is it possible to cancel reservation?
guest: Hi! Thanks. I’ll arrive to Trieste in the morning. If it’s possible to do check in earlier will be much appreciated

host: °°°ENGLISH BELOW°°° 

Ciao Guillermo Hernan, ti diamo il benvenuto e ti ringraziamo per la prenotazione. Di seguito riportiamo alcune informazioni utili da consultare prima del vostro arrivo. 

L’appartamento si trova a Trieste, in via San Lazzaro 1, al primo piano, porta A, appartamento 2.

Il check-in è a partire dalle ore 15:00 e l'accesso è completamente automatizzato e indipendente. Il check-out è previsto entro le ore 10:00. 
Per ragioni di sicurezza, non offriamo il servizio di deposito bagagli. Se avrete necessità di lasciare le vostre valige prima del check in o dopo il check out, vi consigliamo il deposito bagagli https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste

Accesso all'edificio: suonare il campanello "Lazzaro", l’ultimo in basso nella pulsantiera di sinistra. La porta si aprirà automaticamente. Utilizzerai questo metodo per tutti i tuoi accessi. Accesso all'appartamento: prendete l'ascensore fino al primo piano, salite qualche gradino e troverete la porta A, accanto ad essa ci sono alcune cassette per le chiavi, la tua è la 2. Inserisci il codice 2860 e premi la levetta a sinistra, la scatola si aprirà dall'alto verso il basso e al suo interno ci sono le chiavi per entrare nell'appartamento. Ecco un video dimostrativo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c

Se arrivi in treno o in autobus, utilizza l'app Mappa sul tuo cellulare per valutare le migliori opzioni di trasporto pubblico in base all'orario di arrivo. Queste app funzionano molto bene a Trieste. Altrimenti potete raggiungere l'appartamento anche a piedi: la stazione dei treni e degli autobus dista solo 1 km dalla nostra struttura.

Se arrivate in auto, vi consigliamo di parcheggiare al parcheggio multi piano San Giusto: http://www.parksangiusto.it/, si trova accanto al teatro romano, a pochi metri dall'appartamento e costa 20€ per l'intera giornata. In alternativa, potete cercare parcheggio pubblico gratuito in via Capitolina, senza avere fretta, e poi camminare fino all’appartamento.

Il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, potrete lasciate le chiavi sul tavolino all'interno dell'appartamento. 

Vi ricordiamo che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2 € a notte a persona, under 18 esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciarci il corrispettivo in contanti all'interno dell'appartamento. La ricevuta vi sarà spedita via email su richiesta. 

Un'ultima cosa: la legge italiana ci impone di registrare tutti gli ospiti al loro arrivo. Vi chiediamo cortesemente di inviarci via App oppure alla email riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com una copia del passaporto o della carta d'identità di tutti gli ospiti. Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento. 

WiFi net: Lazzaro 
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234 

Buon soggiorno! 

-------------------- 

Hello Guillermo Hernan, we welcome you and thank you for booking. Below, there is some useful information to know before your arrival. 

The apartment is in Trieste, via San Lazzaro 1, 1st floor, door A, unit 2. Check-in is from 3 PM, access is automated and independent. Check-out is by 10 AM. 
If you need to store your luggage before your check-in or after your check-out, we suggest you the luggage storage https://g.page/depositobagaglitrieste - we don't offer this service for safety reasons. 

Building access: ring the bell "Lazzaro", the bottom one in the left bell panel. The door will open automatically. You will use this method for all your accesses. Apartment access: use the elevator up to 1st floor, go up a few steps and you will find the door A, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 2. Enter the code 2860 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c 

If you arrive by train or by bus, please use the Map app on your mobile phone to assess the best public transportation options based on your arrival time. These apps work really well in Trieste. Otherwise, you can also reach the apartment by walking: the train and bus station are only 1km far from our building.

If you arrive by car, we recommend parking at the San Giusto multi-storey car park: http://www.parksangiusto.it/, it is located next to the Roman theatre, a few meters from the apartment and costs €20 for the whole day. Alternatively, you can look for free public parking in via Capitolina, without being in a hurry, and then walk to the apartment.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request. 

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment. 

WiFi net: Lazzaro 
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234 

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

host: Ciao Piero 

spero che il soggiorno proceda bene. Vi ricordiamo gentilmente che domani il check-out è entro le ore 10:00, vi preghiamo di lasciare le chiavi sul tavolo dell'appartamento. Ricordiamo inoltre che il costo della tassa di soggiorno è di 2€ a notte per persona, minori di 18 anni esclusi. Vi chiediamo gentilmente di lasciare i contanti insieme alle chiavi. La ricevuta vi sarà inviata via email su richiesta.

Buona serata!

_________

Hi Piero

I hope your stay goes well. We kindly remind you that tomorrow check-out is by 10:00, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. We also remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is €2 per night per person, excluding children under 18. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you via email upon request.

Good evening!

host: Buongiorno Piero, si è possibile, ma in un altro appartamento sempre allo stesso piano perché il tuo è già stato prenotato. Puoi prenotare tramite Airbnb oppure a questo link https://www.bravolet.com/coupon-c7x8

host: Ciao Adrian mi ha fatto piacere ospitarvi :) vi ho lasciato un'ottima recensione. A presto!

Hi Adrian I was glad to host you :) I've left you a great review. See you soon!
host: Grazie ☺️ we’ll take care of everything

guest: Hi, I really enjoyed my stay.
A small feedback you might want to know.
And since it didn't have reviews yet, I went looking. ;) And that I couldn't really find anything notable means 10/10.

The far Corner in the shower can leak.
Outside the corner between the silver part, the wall and the white floor piece seems to let water through.
A Dish rag to dry your dishes would be nice, the blue microfiber was instantly drenched.
A Basket in the shower to hold shampoo etc. would be good.
The Central light bulb above the bed was missing.
A Quirl/kitchen beater/whisk/(not sure what's called in English) and maybe even a mixing bowl would be nice.
Salt/pepper would be amazing too, if you already have oil and balsamico.
Best regards
host: Thank you :)

Apartment access: use the elevator up to 1st floor, go up a few steps and you will find the door A, besides it there are some key boxes, yours is 2. Enter the code 2860 and press the switch on the left, the box will open from top-down and inside it, there are the keys to get in the apartment. Here is an how-to video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG0R7L-h-_c 

If you arrive by train or by bus, please use the Map app on your mobile phone to assess the best public transportation options based on your arrival time. These apps work really well in Trieste. Otherwise, you can also reach the apartment by walking: the train and bus station are only 1km far from our building.

If you arrive by car, we recommend parking at the San Giusto multi-storey car park: http://www.parksangiusto.it/, it is located next to the Roman theatre, a few meters from the apartment and costs €20 for the whole day. Alternatively, you can look for free public parking in via Capitolina, without being in a hurry, and then walk to the apartment.

Check-out is by 10 AM, please leave the keys on the table in the apartment. We remind you that the cost of the tourist tax is 2 € per night per person, under 18 excluded. We kindly ask you to leave the cash in the apartment. The receipt will be sent to you by email on request. 

Last thing: in accordance with Italian law we must register all guests. Please, send via App or to riccardo.luciani15@gmail.com a copy of your passports, or IDs cards, of all the guests before your arrival. Unregistered people cannot stay in our apartment. 

WiFi net: Lazzaro 
WiFi password: welovetrieste1234 

Enjoy your stay in Trieste!

Le persone non registrate non potranno soggiornare nel nostro appartamento.
